name: Plain Tea
description: A classic milk tea that provides a smooth and refreshing taste, perfect for any time of the day.

name: Ginger Tea
description: This spicy yet soothing tea blends the zest of ginger with the creaminess of milk, giving you warmth and energy.

name: Cardamom Tea
description: A fragrant tea with the exotic touch of cardamom, offering a perfect balance of spices and smooth milk.

name: Gulkand Tea
description: A unique blend of milk tea with sweet rose petal jam (Gulkand), perfect for a soothing and floral experience.

name: MCT Plain
description: A simple yet bold MCT beverage, offering a clean taste and a boost of energy to keep you refreshed.

name: MCT Milk
description: A rich and creamy blend of MCT oil and milk, providing sustained energy and a smooth texture.

name: MCT Double
description: A double shot of MCT oil and coffee for the ultimate energy boost. Feel refreshed and ready to tackle anything.

name: Black Plain Tea
description: A strong and bold black tea that invigorates your senses, perfect for those who enjoy a full-bodied flavor.

name: Lemon Tea
description: A refreshing blend of black tea with a citrusy lemon twist, offering both zest and freshness in every sip.

name: Coriander Tea
description: A unique infusion of coriander seeds with black tea, giving you a fragrant and health-boosting brew.

name: Ginger + Lemon Tea
description: A perfect combination of ginger and lemon in a robust black tea, offering a warm, spicy, and citrusy sensation.

name: Green Tea
description: A classic, soothing green tea rich in antioxidants, ideal for relaxation and everyday wellness.

name: Lemon Grass Tea
description: A refreshing green tea combined with lemon grass, offering a delicate citrus flavor that's both soothing and uplifting.

name: Mint Green Tea
description: A revitalizing blend of green tea and mint, providing a cool, refreshing flavor with every sip.

name: Lemon Tulasi Tea
description: A fragrant mix of green tea and lemon tulasi, providing an aromatic and herbal experience that's both calming and energizing.

name: Blue Tea
description: A vibrant blue tea made from butterfly pea flower and green tea, offering a visually stunning and refreshing taste.

name: Filter Coffee
description: A traditional South Indian filter coffee that's rich, strong, and full of flavor, perfect for any time of the day.

name: Filter Black Coffee
description: A dark and bold black coffee brewed to perfection, offering a robust flavor without the need for milk.

name: Sembaruthi Tea
description: A floral and refreshing hibiscus tea known for its vibrant red color and tangy flavor, packed with antioxidants and a natural cooling effect.

name: Tanner's Tea
description: A delicate blend of herbs and flowers inspired by traditional tanner's tea, offering a citrusy and floral experience similar to lemon green tea.

name: Grapes Tea
description: A unique violet-colored tea infused with natural grape flavor, combining fruitiness with the calming essence of herbal tea.

name: Badam Milk
description: A creamy and nutritious almond milk beverage, flavored with cardamom and saffron for a royal treat.

name: Rose Milk
description: A sweet and fragrant milk drink infused with rose syrup, perfect for a refreshing cool-down.

name: Masala Tea
description: A bold and flavorful milk tea infused with traditional Indian spices, offering a warming and aromatic experience.

name: Chocolate Coffee
description: A rich and indulgent blend of traditional filter coffee with creamy chocolate, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

name: Turmeric Milk
description: A golden and nourishing drink made with turmeric and milk, known for its anti-inflammatory and healing properties.

name: Pepper Milk
description: A spicy and warming milk drink with black pepper, traditionally consumed for its digestive benefits and bold flavor.

name: Honey Milk
description: A soothing and naturally sweet milk beverage infused with pure honey, perfect for a calming break.

name: Hot Badam
description: A warm and nutritious almond milk drink, spiced with saffron and cardamom, ideal for cozy evenings.

name: Somarasam
description: A traditional South Indian herbal summer drink made with natural ingredients to cool the body and refresh the mind.

name: Lime Juice
description: A zesty and revitalizing lime juice made fresh, perfect for quenching your thirst on a hot day.

name: Butter Milk
description: A tangy and cooling drink made with curd and spices, great for digestion and beating the heat.

name: Lassi
description: A creamy and sweet yogurt-based drink, flavored with cardamom and served chilled for a refreshing treat.
